Chapter 230: The Wind Rises

"Lord Longxi, what should we do now? Should we cooperate with the Netherworld Cult?"

After leaving the castle, Mahat asked with concern.

"Cooperation, what can we cooperate with?

Envoy Yang, you should understand that the members of my July Club are all in the Alpha Kingdom, and the interests are also in the Alpha Kingdom.

Do you think it is possible for everyone to abandon their wives and children and run to the Duchy of Hesse to take risks?

Since the disappearance of the leader, the July Club is no longer the same July Club as before!

The July Society is now on the verge of splitting up. The common belief of revenge against the five major families in the North is no longer enough to keep the organization running.

Especially those guys who have acquired territories in the Near East are now concentrating on developing their own territories.

When it comes to revenge, they've found a better partner.

Compared to a half-dead organization, following Marshal Hudson is much better than following us!"

As he spoke, Long Xi sighed deeply.

If he had known the situation would develop like this, he would not have randomly recruited people to join the gang.

When they forced Baron Kate to join the club, they never expected that such an unintentional action would actually lead to a wolf entering the house.

There is no way, it's all Kate's fault. After joining the club, he worked hard to climb up and made great contributions to the club.

In order to gain everyone's trust, he even personally killed a direct descendant of one of the five major families in the North.

He thought he had the upper hand and could be trusted and reused, but this guy turned around and sold a group of elites in the army to Hudson.

What's even more tragic is that no one knew about this beforehand, and used the club's resources to support these people, pushing them into the position of lords.

Originally, he thought he could take the opportunity to gain a foothold in the Near East, legally control military power, and increase the strength of the July Society.

The plan progressed very smoothly, but in the later stages of development, these noble lords did not listen to the command of the headquarters.

Realizing that something was wrong, these guys have banded together to become the most powerful group in the July Club.

The leader of the guild personally led people to deal with the matter, but he disappeared as soon as he entered the Near East.

At this point, everyone realized that something was wrong. However, the headquarters was not strong enough to suppress these powerful factions, which led to a stalemate.

You can't even overturn the table.

The members of the July Society in the Near East have already defected to Hudson with the help of Kate, so even if their identities are exposed, that's it.

The news that Kate came to kill members of the five major families was leaked by them, causing the anger of the five dukes.

Then he was just angry, and the official document of accountability turned into a piece of waste paper when it reached the Middle East.

Hudson personally intervened in the case, directly determined that the evidence was fabricated, and overturned the investigation results.

For this reason, both parties took the lawsuit to the royal capital, and finally the matter was dropped with the king's attempt to smooth things over.

Just because those with backers are not afraid of exposing their identities doesn't mean these people are not afraid of being exposed.

If they expose each other's secrets together, the powerful group in the Near East may not be in trouble, but none of them, the bigwigs of the July Society, will be able to escape.

"Lord Longxi, why did you sign the contract if you didn't want to participate?"

Farley on the side asked with concern.

Contracts are not signed randomly. If they are not fulfilled, the backlash can make people live a life worse than death.

"Under the circumstances at the time, if we didn't sign the contract, none of us would have been able to leave alive.

Once this kind of thing is exposed, the cult organizations involved will suffer a devastating disaster.

The reason we have been able to remain active in the underground world is that the aristocratic group needs a cult organization.

Once their tentacles reach out to the royal power and challenge their bottom line, the nobles won't mind replacing them with a group of more obedient people.

"The five great families in the North alone are enough to force us into hiding. If all the nobles join forces, do you think they can't uncover our identities?"

After Long Xi finished speaking, the faces of the Yin and Yang Envoys changed drastically.

The truth is so heartbreaking.

I thought they hadn't been caught because they hid deep enough. I never expected that the truth was that they didn't want to dig out.

Carefully recalling what had happened in the past, the two soon discovered that something was wrong.

Many cases could have been investigated further, but in the end they were left unresolved.

Originally they thought it was just luck, but now it seems that those great nobles were deliberately letting them off the hook.

After all, the July Society is an outlier among cult organizations.

Apart from shouting random slogans, their usual actions were only directed against the five major families in the North and were completely harmless to the nobles of other kingdoms.

There was no danger to everyone's interests, and the five major families happened to like to stir up hatred, so everyone was happy to keep them to cause trouble for the five major families in the north.

In comparison, other cults are much more miserable. For example, the Skull and Bones Society is often hunted down and has to run around the world.

More than 90% of cults would not last more than three years, and many more would be strangled by the nobles within a few months of their establishment.

"Lord Longxi, if we don't participate in the operation, what will you do?"

The Yin and Yang Envoys asked in unison.

The two were close confidants cultivated by Long Xi, and although they already held high positions in the July Club, their relationship had not changed.

"What is there to worry about? The contract only requires confidentiality and participation, but how we participate is up to us.

What's more, such big news could be worth a lot of money.

If someone offers a high enough price, I can use my life to exchange for a future for everyone, that's not a bad idea! "

Long Xi said with a smile.

He was not so selfless as to sacrifice his life for the future of his subordinates. But he was helpless in the world, and now he was no longer barefoot.

Don't just think about yourself, think about your family too.

When he was alive, he could still provide shelter for his family. But because he blindly pursued strength in his youth, he now has accumulated a lot of hidden injuries and he doesn't have many years left to live.

July's identity has become the biggest security risk for his family.

While he was alive, he could still rely on the power of the society to protect him. Once he passed away, the children in his family would not be able to keep the family business.

The best option is to clear your identity in advance. If you can do everyone a favor, that would be even better.

Compared to cult organizations, the eating habits of the aristocratic world are much better.

Especially those who have just come ashore need a good reputation. Those who owe favors will naturally repay them.

...

"Marshal, the top leaders of the July Society want to discuss a big deal with you. They are very secretive. I have used all the connections in the society, but still haven't been able to find out."

Kate reported to the Baron with a serious look.

In recent years, it seems that Kate has not changed much, but the actual power in her hands has increased significantly.

By betraying the July Club, he gained Hudson's trust; and with Hudson's support, he continued to increase his influence within the July Club.

At present, Baron Katelai is also a top figure in the Near East. If his situation is not too embarrassing, he can at least get a position as a county governor.

There was no other way. Born into the Northern noble group, he stabbed this interest group in the back. He joined the July Society and then betrayed it.

No matter what the reason is, such capricious people will not be welcomed in politics.

Even with Hudson's support, Kate's appointment as county magistrate was rejected after arriving in the royal capital.

The revenge of the five major families in the north is one thing, but more importantly, the kingdom's top leaders do not like traitors.

Suppressing the small and medium nobles is an unspoken rule. If traitors are allowed to hold high positions, the powerful will be even more sleepless.

As an insider, Hudson understands Kate's choice to come to the Baron very well. To sum it up in one sentence: she had no choice!

Once a person has a weak spot, many things are beyond his control. Kate is strong when she is alone, but Kate is no longer invulnerable when she has a wife, children and elders.

Betraying the Northern Noble Group was a pledge of allegiance that the July Society had forced him to make. Although no knife was placed on his neck, if he dared to refuse at that time, his wife and children would have to go with him to see the Lord of Dawn.

Betraying the July Club was even easier. It was Hudson who was behind the scenes, the only difference was that he didn't force her, he just made Kate realize that the July Club had no future.

No father wants his child to live with the identity of a cult member. If you want to get out of a cult, you will inevitably have to pay a price.

Besides, Hudson's request was not high. He only asked him to quietly poach members of the July Club, and did not ask him to openly break with the July Club.

Kate did not disappoint Hudson when she came. She was very good at poaching people and directly formed a faction within the July Club.

Relying on the strength in their hands, they made the July Club headquarters dare not turn against them. Although they were clearly traitors, in the end, because of interests, the two sides maintained a superficial relationship.

Although he understood it, he still hesitated to use it. Hudson was also happy to see someone help him be a villain.

This situation is the best now. Hudson has already given Kate wealth and glory. It was Wang Du who suppressed Kate's baronial title and power. We can't blame him as the boss for being unfair.

But in the continent of Aslant, the most important things are reputation and power. Without these things, no matter how successful Kate is, he is still just a minor noble.

If he wanted to become bigger, that was impossible. The reason why the group of people from the July Club were able to be pulled over was mainly because he had the support of Hudson behind him.

Who would buy into a baron's reputation just based on his name?

"Tell the July Club headquarters that if you want to do big business, you should show your sincerity first. If you hide your intentions, you are not a businessman!"

Hudson said without changing his expression.

Poaching is something that is shameful for both parties. Until the window paper is broken, both parties are still considered potential allies.

Privately, the business dealings between the two sides never stopped. Especially when targeting the five major families in the North, the two sides had cooperated many times.

But these are all in the past. Sooner or later, the window paper will be broken, and both sides have begun to be wary of each other.

At this time, when the people from the July Club came to him to discuss big business, Hudson couldn't help but suspect that there was something fishy going on.

Of course, if the action is against the five major families in the North, then it is another matter.

Kingdom of Avarat. With the joint efforts of all parties, the delegation successfully brought back the results of the investigation.

It can be seen that everyone has high hopes for reform at this moment, hoping that through internal reforms, the kingdom can return to the ranks of powerful countries on the continent.

However, the focus of the contradiction also lies in the investigation results.

Although the core idea of ​​the political systems of the three major kingdoms of Frank, Illibya and Alpha is the supremacy of aristocracy, they all have their own characteristics in terms of specific details.

Regardless of whose homework is copied, the interests of some people in the kingdom will be seriously damaged. Perhaps after the reform is successful, it can be compensated by other means, but who knows?

According to past political experience, whoever makes concessions first for the sake of the overall situation will suffer the most in the reform.

The situation suddenly came to a standstill, and even within the reform faction, only a very small number of people were willing to sacrifice their own interests for the sake of reform.

Many reformist elders have become conservative when it comes to their own interests.

We can't do this, we can't do that. We promised to carry out reforms, but when it came to actual action, we ran into obstacles everywhere.

Prince Peter, who had returned with honors, was now in an awkward situation. Many nobles had doubts about the results of the inspection, believing that the information recorded was too one-sided.

Duke Grenafan, the leader of the reformists, was also troubled. He had discovered many problems that could be solved through reform, but when it came to implementation, chaos occurred.

Reform bills were introduced one after another, but the result was that the government's orders did not come from the capital. The nobles in various places had a high degree of autonomy and simply ignored the orders from the capital.

Even the nobles who supported the reformists only picked out the clauses that were beneficial to them and pretended not to notice the clauses that were detrimental to their own interests.

"Your Majesty, we can't delay this any longer!

Unless we take compulsory measures, the decrees we issue will be nothing but a piece of waste paper when they reach the local level.

If the process is delayed for too long, the government's authority will be undermined, and it will be even more difficult to continue the reforms!"

The words of the Prime Minister, Duke of Grenafan, made Elton VIII very embarrassed. On the one hand, he wanted the reform to succeed, but on the other hand, he did not want to offend the noble lords in the country too much.

"Prime Minister, there are so many reform bills. If we want to promote them all, I'm afraid we won't be able to do so. It would be better to pick the ones that are most likely to be accepted by everyone and promote them first."

Elton VIII said with an embarrassed look on his face.

It is easy to cut flesh from others, but it is a different matter to cut flesh from yourself.

As the largest aristocracy in the country, the royal family was also a victim of the reforms.

There is no way, the reformists wanted too much. When formulating the law, they drew on the advantages of the political systems of the three countries and wanted to copy them all.

For example: the military mobilization system of the Alpha Kingdom, the taxation system of the Frankish Kingdom, and the foreign trade system of the Libyan Kingdom.

These systems are the most advanced in the contemporary world. Theoretically, as long as they are copied, the Kingdom of Avarat will be able to possess the advantages of the three countries at the same time, and it will be difficult for it not to rise.

The trouble is that the deeper the reform, the more interest groups need to be affected.

"Your Majesty, if the reform is to be carried out in batches, I suggest starting with taxation.

The traditional tax-farming system is too mechanical and rigid, resulting in a large amount of tax revenue being lost every year.

The kingdom suffered heavy losses, and the people below were also suffering. If the kingdom could collect taxes in a unified way, it would not only be able to significantly increase fiscal revenue, but also take the opportunity to abolish those unreasonable and heavy taxes.

Once the government's financial situation improves, those projects that were forced to stop due to financial pressure can be restarted.

As long as everyone can see the results, resistance to reform will surely be greatly reduced! "

The prime minister's words made King Elton VIII look happy.

Almost all dynasties started their decline with finances, and the Avarat Kingdom was no exception. Even though they had done nothing, the government was still so poor that they had to rob Peter to pay Paul.

This kind of impact is all-round. If the financial problem can be solved, the Kingdom of Avarat will survive.

The government is also able to provide financial support for other reforms in the future. The long-overdue military and government salaries can all be settled at the same time.

"Okay, let's do it!"

The king said it lightly, but the ministers below all looked unhappy.

Compared with reforms in other areas, tax reform involves the most interest groups.

Which group in the Kingdom of Avarat has not benefited from the tax farming system?

It's clearly a big gamble to go for it right from the start.

Although people know about it, no one has raised the issue. This is because the issue is too difficult to solve. Being able to find a problem does not mean being able to solve it.

The game started out so big that Duke Grenafan was powerless. If the government was not allowed to get out of its financial difficulties, subsequent reforms would not be possible.

...

With the introduction of the law abolishing the tax farming system, the road to reform of the Kingdom of Avarat was completely opened.

Hudson, who was thousands of miles away, also felt the breath of reform. However, his focus was not on reform, but on the "return gift" sent by the nobles of Avarat.

The old kingdoms are different. The nobles who suffer from overpopulation don't take the population seriously at all.

Hudson only gave away some magic potions and got thousands of serfs in return. But the other party thought he had made a lot of money, which made him feel a little embarrassed.

This complex emotion did not last long and was broken by an old friend from the July Club who came to visit.

...

"Marshal, these are our gifts, please accept them!"

Long Xi said cautiously.

The last time the two met was to purchase weapons and equipment. When they met again, their identities and status were very different.

Looking at the dozens of boxes neatly arranged in front of him, Hudson had a new understanding of "a little bit of thought".

This is no longer a business negotiation, but more like a bribe. However, the means are a bit crude. Under normal circumstances, the host would not accept such a gift without any technical content.

"Let's talk business first!

Your Excellency has gone to such great lengths and risked his life to come here, you can't just come here to give me a gift, right?"

Hudson said with a half-smile.

Whether or not the gift can be accepted depends entirely on the outcome of the subsequent conversation. He is well-known for this, and will never accept a gift if he cannot do the job.

"Marshal, this matter involves serious consequences. Once I tell you, I will be immediately hit by the contract and will almost certainly die, so I hope you can make a promise.

You can rest assured that the news I am about to tell you is definitely worth the price!"

After saying that, Long Xi looked at Hudson expectantly.

"You are really generous to risk your life. First, tell me what kind of promise you want from me."

Chapter 231: Times Have Changed

"Your Excellency can rest assured that as long as the information you bring is valuable enough, I will naturally come forward to protect your family.

As for the July meeting, it depends on their performance.

In fact, I have already accepted some members of the July Club and have no prejudice against you.

We all come from the north and have a common enemy, so we should all be friends!"

Hudson said with a smile.

In this world where background matters, the Koslo family, which originated in the North, naturally finds it easier to gain the trust of the July Society members.

If you look up the family tree, you will most likely be able to find distant relatives.

When one is weak, these relationships mean nothing, but once one becomes strong, even the most distant relatives can be reestablished.

The July Society, which is composed of declining nobles, can actually establish a real relationship with the only great noble family, the Koslo family.

It's not just talk, it's action. Hudson didn't personally participate, but other members of the Koslow family were working hard.

In order not to waste talent, Hudson sent the older generation of the family to handle interpersonal relationships.

Every year the Lord's Mansion would allocate special funds for reception. No matter how far away the relatives or friends were, or how poor they were, they would be received strictly according to etiquette standards.

Even though they have become commoners, they still maintain proper etiquette. It is hard not to feel good about this kind of "respect".

Over time, word of mouth will build up.

Gradually, Long Xi was regarded as half of his own by the July Club, so it was not surprising that he chose to sell the news to Hudson.

It was always more reliable to trade with one's own people than to go to an unknown king. What if the other party turned away and sold the goods to the five major families in the north? Wouldn't that be a tragedy?

"Marshal, not long ago, the Netherworld Cult invited many evil cults, including us, to discuss an alliance..."

Just as the content was explained, the backlash of the contract broke out. Looking at Long Xi struggling to death, Hudson couldn't bear it and took out a small bottle and handed it to him:

"Taking these potions can help you temporarily suppress the backlash of the contract. Whether you can survive it later depends on what contract you signed!"

After seeing the horror of the contract's backlash, Hudson finally understood why everyone was so afraid of the contract. Sometimes death is not scary, but living a life worse than death is the worst.

In some powerful contracts, the backlash force not only affects the body, but also the soul.

Even if the body dies, the backlash force will still act on the soul, haunting the person and preventing him from being free.

Humans have naturally done some research on the power of contract backlash. The potion Hudson took out was from the formula of the Arcane Academy.

The title of honorary principal cannot be held for nothing. It is reasonable for him to help take the blame and get some research and development results for free.

Originally it could only temporarily suppress the backlash force, but after Hudson's research, it has been able to reduce the backlash force to some extent.

The specific efficacy is still unknown. The unlucky Long Xi was the first guinea pig user.

How much effect it can have now depends on luck.

After taking the medicine, Long Xi, who had temporarily saved his life, said with gratitude:

"Thank you, Marshal!"

He had come across medicines that could suppress the backlash of contracts before. Not only were they expensive, but the effects were also hard to describe.

It can still alleviate the backlash of ordinary contracts. For a vicious contract like this, it can only be said that something is better than nothing.

Judging from the effect, the medicine I just took is not ordinary stuff.

Long Xi was not surprised by this. It was normal for the potion prepared by the continent's number one magic pharmacist to have good effects.

"While there is still time, go back and take care of your affairs!"

Hudson said nonchalantly.

After studying magic for so many years, his vision had already been improved. Long Xi seemed to have saved his life, but the backlash force was still lingering.

It is almost impossible to escape the backlash of the contract with just a bottle of potion.

Even if you get a few more bottles, it can only last for a while. Once the backlash on the soul ferments, the potion will lose its effect.

Judging from the strength of the backlash force, even if a strong man in the Holy Domain was touched by it, he would be seriously injured if he did not die.

Unfortunately, Long Xi is only an eighth-level warrior, and he relied on external force to break through.

The foundation was already shaky, and there was absolutely no hope of making any further progress within the last limited lifespan.

After sending Long Xi away, Hudson began to think about the authenticity of the news. A group of evil cult organizations from the Central Continent and the Northern Continent were going to join forces to cause trouble, and the scale of the move was extraordinary.

The Hesse Kingdom has already been severely damaged. If it is caught off guard again, it would not be surprising that a change of dynasty would occur.

However, this kind of thing cannot be ruled out as a conspiracy of the cult, deliberately drawing his attention to the Kingdom of Hessen. After a phantom shot, he aimed at the other four countries in the Five Nations Alliance.

As long as the message gets out and countries are prepared in advance, cult organizations will not be able to cause any major waves.

It's not that Hudson looked down on them, it's just that the gap in strength between the two sides is too great. Don't look at the reputation of the evil cult organizations, as long as their identities are exposed, the local nobles can send them to hell.

What Hudson is struggling with now is how to turn the news into tangible benefits.

They are all burdened by "fame"!

The great nobles are all respectable people, but with Hudson's current status and position, they can no longer talk about interests all the time.

Many things can only be traded in secret. It is better not to be too utilitarian about things that are put out in the open.

"That's all!

There are eight out of ten things in the world that are not satisfactory. Being able to gain a favor from one person is also a good harvest! "

After secretly convincing himself, Hudson immediately called for guards and passed the message on.

However, he concealed the specific location and target of the action, leaving it to each country to act on its own in order to avoid subsequent changes in the situation.

If the leader of his own club had not disappeared and secretly manipulated and guided Long Xi, he might not have taken this path.

This big drama seems to be staged to clear the name of July Club, but no one knows the real purpose.

It's not that I look down on Long Xi, but his strength is far from enough to suppress the backlash of the contract.

But your guess is not completely impossible. In recent years, Hudson has been praised by the outside world as the number one magic potion master in the continent, so he should still have some ability.

Continue to stare at Long Xi and observe his subsequent changes. If nothing unexpected happens, at the last moment of his life, he should choose to go back to accompany his wife and children.

Is it really ruthless?

Or is there love?

Nobody knows!

As time went by, the governments of various countries that received the news did not take any overt action, but they were secretly on edge.

It is very easy for governments to verify the authenticity of news. The first difficulty faced by the large alliance of cult organizations is the transfer of personnel.

Wherever members of a cult gather, that is where the problem breaks out.

When multiple cult organizations work together, they lack sufficient trust in each other, and problems in coordination are inevitable.

Kingdom of Hesse.

I thought the Hessen Kingdom should be the leader among the three kingdoms in the Central Continent. No matter how much trouble the cult organization caused, they would not come here to die.

"You bastard!"

"It is outrageous that a few low-level cult organizations dared to target the kingdom!

The cult organization believes that they are the weakest among the five-nation alliance, and this is definitely not an isolated case. The international community may also think so.

In order to eradicate cult organizations, governments of various countries have made great efforts, but unfortunately, cult organizations cannot be completely eradicated.

In addition to the fact that these people are lurking deep, there are also great nobles from all over the country who like to deliberately leave a tail so that they can act as scapegoats when they eliminate dissidents.

All kinds of shady things and unjust cases can be blamed on cult organizations.

This wave of cult organizations is bringing about their own destruction and challenging the bottom line of the aristocratic group. This is undoubtedly the best time to eradicate them.

Although new cults would be born in the future even if these guys were wiped out, Alexander V still decided to make an example of them.

"Ministry of Foreign Affairs, communicate with all countries in a timely manner to ensure the success of this operation.

"Ally" is no joke. If we allow the evil cult in our own territory to go to the Kingdom of Hessen to cause chaos, how can we justify this alliance!

Holding someone back and stabbing someone in the back are things that only happen under special circumstances.

This kind of external force infusion also has an upper limit. It mainly depends on the individual's carrying capacity. Some people can improve two or three realms, while some people can barely improve one realm.

For the strong, this kind of infusion basically has no effect. Anyway, Hudson has never seen the holy land created by the evil god.

It may be possible to do so, but the prerequisites that need to be met are extremely demanding.

Without the big guys to hunt, Hudson, who was proud of his status, had no time to pay attention to those cult trash.

As the battle progresses, those cult believers whose strength had been forcibly increased by the evil god in the early stages have begun to suffer backlash.

Perhaps it was because their strength increased too quickly and their minds became unstable, or perhaps it was because they were influenced by evil spirits, these guys behaved particularly crazily on the battlefield.

This is a vicious cycle. The more they kill, the more difficult it is for them to control themselves, and the more extreme their temperaments become.

Except for a very small number of cult believers who can rely on their willpower to control the desire to kill, most of the evil god believers whose strength is forcibly increased are killing machines.

In small-scale local battles, the cult rebels were invincible thanks to their madness. But once they encountered a large-scale decisive battle, the situation was reversed.

Judging from the battle situation feedback from various parts of the mainland, the cult rebels were all defeated in the past few large-scale decisive battles.

The more armies on both sides, the worse the cult rebels will lose. On the contrary, in local battles, the rebels can gain a great advantage with their crazy energy.

In this context, the rebels seem to be strong and expanding their territory, but strategically they have begun to decline.

It seemed that everything was going in a good direction, but Hudson was not happy at all.

Deep down in his heart, there was always a voice telling him that this was just an appetizer served at the beginning of a banquet, and there would be bigger troubles to come.

...

Hudson was shocked at first when he heard the news, but then he recovered.

There were rumors that Charles III wanted to become emperor two or three years ago, and many people, including Hudson, were mentally prepared.

When the rumor became reality, Hudson was only momentarily distracted. After all, with the current strength of the Frankish Kingdom, it was reasonable to establish an empire.

However, the political impact caused by this has just begun. Small countries are fine, but the key is the stance of several major countries.

It must be admitted that Charles III chose a good time. All countries were busy suppressing cult rebellions, and at least half of their energy was dispersed.

...

The Holy Mountain of Light, Pius Seven was so angry that he broke a pillar. Fortunately, the hall was built strong enough and did not collapse due to the lack of a load-bearing pillar.

"What do you all eat?

Why didn't we get any news about Charles III becoming emperor in advance?

..."

Pius VII's harsh criticism made the high-ranking officials of the Vatican feel very aggrieved. The news that Charles III wanted to become emperor was not a big news.

The preparation work was done several times, but each time it came to nothing due to external pressure.

We have heard the story of "The Boy Who Cried Wolf" so many times that we have become numb to it. Who would have thought that the wolf would actually come this time!

Caught off guard, by the time the news reached these high-ranking officials, Charles III had already been crowned.

In the past, the Pope had to appear in person for the emperor's coronation. But now it's different. People have established their own church, so how can they abide by the rules set by the church?

In any case, Charles III's enthronement was now an established fact, and the adverse political impact had already been caused.

"Your Majesty, now is not the time to pursue responsibility. Just because we can tolerate a powerful Frankish Kingdom does not mean we can accept a powerful Frankish Empire.

Charles III, who proclaimed himself emperor, had already revealed his ambition. Such acts of breaking the rules and challenging everyone's bottom line would inevitably be backfired.

We must contact the continental countries as soon as possible, form an intervention coalition, and force Charles III to abdicate! "

As soon as Bishop Solon's proposal came out, it immediately received support from a number of high-ranking officials of the Vatican.

With new and old grudges piling up, no one would show mercy in trying to pull Charles III off the throne.

If it is handled well, perhaps it will be possible to interrupt Frank's upward trend in one fell swoop and restore the majesty of the Dawn Church on the continent of Aslant!

Chapter 240: Unrest in the Court

Charles III's enthronement was like adding a bucket of water to a frying pan. Oil mixed with water droplets splashed out, causing the frying pan of the Aslant continent to crack.

Faced with this kind of big news, the cult rebellion had to take a back seat. The rumors became reality, and all the major forces that received the news were stunned.

It was not only the Holy See that reacted strongly. The Yinlibia Kingdom in the southern continent also felt the pressure.

"Charles III has become emperor, and the Franks' ambitions have all been exposed. Now is the time for the kingdom to make a choice.

Opportunities and challenges coexist. The choices we make now will determine the future fate of the kingdom. What do you think? Tell us what you think? "

Bordeaux VIII's solemn question made the atmosphere in the hall suddenly become serious.

Although the southern continent is vast, it cannot accommodate three overlords. The Frankish Kingdom, the Libyan Kingdom, and the Church, only one of them can survive.

In the past, they just watched the fight between the Frankish Kingdom and the Holy See and took sides according to their own interests.

As time went by, the balance between the two was eventually broken.

On one side is the rising Frankish Kingdom, and on the other side is the fading Vatican. It is obvious which one is stronger and which one is weaker.

Watching the gap in power between the two sides widen, the Libyan Kingdom, which had originally been able to play both sides, inevitably leaned towards the Holy See politically.

It's just that because of the conflict between royal power and divine power, the two families, which should have worked together, did not really stand together.

"Your Majesty, Charles III's claim to the throne is an absolute failure! For the sake of a false title, he put the country in danger. It is totally not worth it.

With the strength of the Frankish Kingdom, as long as they continue to develop step by step, they will be able to completely suppress the Holy See in ten years at most.

If we wait until that time to declare ourselves emperor, the Five-Nation Alliance will be unable to reach us, and we will probably have no choice but to accept the outcome.

But it's different now. Although the Holy See is in decline, it still has strength.

Although the kingdom's overall strength is slightly inferior, when it joins forces with the Holy See, its strength is still greater than that of the Frankish Kingdom.

The countries on the continent are not fools. Although they hate the Holy See, they also dislike the emperor.

If the countries were to take sides, the probability of supporting the Frankish Kingdom would be very low. Even some countries that were dependent on them might not support the Frankish Kingdom at this moment.

The only thing you need to pay attention to is: when joining forces with various forces, you must be careful and vigilant to avoid being betrayed by your allies! "

Prime Minister Marquis Olmos said with an embarrassed look on his face.

If possible, he did not want to go to war with the Frankish Kingdom. It seemed that the first kingdom on the continent and the second kingdom on the continent were only one rank apart, but the gap in strength between the two was definitely not small.

The Franks became the strongest nation on the continent through repeated wars. Many countries, including Libya, suffered at the hands of the Franks on the battlefield.

But reality is always different from what we think. Libya could tolerate the Frankish Kingdom becoming a hegemonic country, but could not watch them become an empire.

It seems to be just a family affair of the Franks, but in fact it affects the future development of the human race.

If they didn't find a way to interrupt Charles III's path to becoming king, the outside world would think they were scared. They might not even be able to attract allies in the subsequent international camps.

"Prime Minister, it may be difficult to form an intervention coalition. The Five Nations Alliance has been separated from the outside. At this moment, the three countries in the Central Continent are busy suppressing the cult rebellion. There are also foreign races around, eyeing them covetously. It is unknown whether they can send a large army.

In the southern continent, except for us and the Holy See, the other kingdoms have already declined.

Even if they are willing to join the war, they can't send many elite troops. The main force of the intervening coalition will most likely fall on us and the Holy See.

Theoretically speaking, if we combine the strength of our two families, plus the support of other countries on the continent, we can indeed crush the Franks.

But all this is based on the assumption that the enemy does not take any action and sits there waiting to be killed. If the Franks take the initiative to attack, those fence-sitters may not dare to take sides.

If the people of the Church play a trick on us and do not put in enough effort on the battlefield, then the situation may very well turn into a showdown between us and the Franks..."

Lord Midford swallowed back the most unpleasant words, but his analysis of the worst possible scenario was deeply imprinted in everyone's mind.

From a diplomatic perspective, this situation is indeed possible. Selling out teammates is not something that has never happened in human history.

It is undoubtedly in the best interests of the Vatican to work without putting in any effort and just sit back and watch Libya and Frank suffer losses.

Of course, the prerequisite is that the Libyan Kingdom has the strength to fight the Franks to a draw. If the battle is one-sided, the Church will not dare to stand aside and watch.

"What Earl Midford said is correct. There is still a certain gap between the kingdom and the Franks. We must avoid fighting alone.

If we want to join hands with the Holy See to organize an intervention army, then we must ask the Holy See to go all out.

If possible, it would be best to reduce the presence of the kingdom and let the Holy See serve as the main force of the anti-French alliance!"

The Marquis of Francesco was also embarrassed by the Minister of War's cowardly words.

However, now is the time to make a decision. He cannot let the kingdom's top leaders misjudge the military strength of both sides for the sake of an illusory face.

A group of people were talking about the risks, but no one was against sending troops to intervene. It was obvious that Charles III's claim to the throne had touched the core bottom line of the Libyan Kingdom.

After much discussion, the intervention plan was approved. However, the specific implementation process must be done with great caution.

Similar scenes are playing out in many countries. Although in the eyes of several major powers, these countries are just fence-sitters who are just joining in the fun, it does not mean that they themselves think so.

In particular, several kingdoms that have already declined are all prepared to take this opportunity to show their strength to the outside world so as to avoid being looked down upon.

The international disturbances also affected the Alpha Kingdom, but compared with the previous high efficiency, the Kingdom's government's response this time was much slower.

When Hudson rushed to the capital to attend the meeting, it was already half a month after Charles III ascended the throne. The Holy See and Yin Libya had already called on human countries to form an intervention coalition internationally.

Being politically unresponsive is a statement in itself. If it weren't for the desire to be gregarious, Hudson doubted that today's meeting would have been held.

The Kingdom of Alpha would certainly not recognize Charles III's claim to the throne, as this was a matter of principle. However, sending troops to intervene was another matter.

Stepping into the palace hall and feeling the atmosphere of the venue, Hudson could only use one word to describe it: "ice and fire".

Except for King Caesar IV who was very unhappy, most of the others were indifferent to Charles III's enthronement.

Of course, you can be indifferent in your heart, but you will definitely criticize it on the surface. Unfortunately, everyone is too focused on watching the fun, and the criticism is not performed well.

Hudson followed the crowd and cursed Charles III a few times, then sat down in his seat, leisurely drinking tea and eating snacks.

If someone takes the lead, there will naturally be no shortage of imitators. The originally serious meeting instantly turned into a tea-drinking exchange meeting.

As the boss, Caesar IV was very dissatisfied with all this. However, in the Alpha Kingdom, there was no such crime as "disrespectful behavior in front of the emperor".

If a minor noble loses his manners, he will be considered uneducated and laughed at by the aristocratic circle. But for a great noble, it is considered as carelessness.

Back in the day, Hudson was often referred to as a bumpkin, but that changed when he became the marshal of the kingdom.

Those who had offended him in the past would come running to apologize, bringing generous gifts.

As a magnanimous nobleman, Hudson naturally would not bother with these villains. However, these guys still had a hard time.

This is the power brought by power. Even if Hudson did nothing, he would still make life difficult for those villains who had offended him.

It may seem like there is no revenge, but in fact it is more terrible than revenge. This is because people sympathize with the weak, especially the aristocratic circle with complicated relationships.

If Hudson really took action to retaliate, there would definitely be some nobles who would come out to rescue him. On the contrary, doing nothing would make these guys even more uncomfortable.

Precious family connections are used to save lives, not to be wasted. If you suffer a little injustice, people may not see it.

Seeing the growing crowd of people watching the fun, Caesar IV's mood became worse and worse. The group of ministers in front of him was really annoying, and none of them would open up to him.

"boom!"

After clapping his hands fiercely, Caesar IV shouted at everyone, "Enough!

I asked you to come here today to hold a meeting, not to listen to you cursing.

If you want to curse Charles III, go to the Frankish Kingdom! No matter how harshly you curse him here, no one will hear you! "

The king suddenly lost his temper, and the ministers were also shocked. However, no one found out that the cause was themselves, and they just thought that the king was in a bad mood.

Deep down, some people still wondered if the king and the queen had quarreled again.

Ever since the prince's accident, problems have arisen in the love life of the model couple, the king and the queen.

Of course, this is the king's family affair, and no one would be stupid enough to get involved.

As for Caesar IV's proposal, everyone tacitly pretended not to hear it. It didn't matter if they were just talking nonsense on their own territory.

If you go to the Frankish Kingdom and curse Charles III, it means you are really tired of living.

"Your Majesty, there is actually nothing to discuss about Charles III's enthronement.

We must certainly condemn this act of ascending the throne despite opposition from various countries.

However, there is no need to interfere with the coalition. The Franks made great efforts in the establishment of the Five Nations Alliance, and this is a good opportunity to repay this favor.

Even if we don't participate, the outside world will understand. We don't get along with the Dawn Church. Where they are, there is no us.

The intervention coalition was organized by the Holy See, how can the Kingdom join it! "

As soon as the Prime Minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, finished his words, Caesar IV became angry again.

From the perspective of the kingdom, there is nothing wrong with doing this. The Alpha Kingdom has no conflict of interest in the southern continent, so a few verbal condemnations are enough to show their stance.

But from the king's perspective, the situation was completely different. Originally everyone was on an equal footing, but now someone suddenly wanted to jump to the front and suppress the others. How could this be tolerated?

What's worse is that when Charles III ascended the throne and proclaimed himself emperor, he also announced that he would continue the legal system of the last unified empire in human history, which was a challenge to all monarchs.

Wouldn't it be a disguised recognition that the Frankish Empire was the orthodox human race and that their kings were just restless princes if Charles III was allowed to be emperor?

Even if it is inconvenient for the kingdom to send troops, it still has to send an expeditionary force symbolically to strongly demonstrate the political stance of the Alpha Kingdom.

"Prime Minister, you are old!

There is no such thing as human relations between countries. Everything should be based on the interests of the kingdom. Why should we care about the feelings of the Franks?"

As soon as Caesar IV finished speaking, the atmosphere in the hall suddenly became tense. As a monarch, saying that a minister is old, isn't this clearly sending him home?

If other people were asked to resign, everyone would understand. The Grand Duke of Newfoundland in front of him was not an ordinary prime minister of the kingdom, but also a core member of the royal family.

It is easy to replace the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, but it is not an easy task to pick someone from the royal family to fill the vacancy.

Are we going to let Grand Duke Efiero take the throne?

This thought flashed through everyone's mind. The position of the prime minister was very important, and the position of the military minister was equally important.

It is impossible to hold both positions!

If someone holds two positions at the same time, the king will not be able to sleep well. This practice of destroying the political balance is completely deliberate cultivation of powerful officials.

If Grand Duke Efiero fills the position, the vacant position of Minister of War will not be taken by an ordinary person.

At least at this moment, no member of the royal family has the prestige to hold such an important position.

If personnel adjustments are made without authorization when a suitable successor cannot be found, it would be equivalent to handing over the political resources of the royal family to others.

Even if the person promoted is the king's confidant, as long as he sits in the position, a new political group will inevitably be born.

Even if this person is loyal to the royal family, he still has to arrange his own people. It seems to be a simple replacement, but in fact it is a major earthquake that affects the political balance of the kingdom.

Hudson, who was mentally prepared, did not panic with everyone else and just acted as a spectator.

There is no family affection in front of power, even members of the royal family cannot stand in the way of the king.

It is very regrettable that the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, who devoted his life to the kingdom, never imagined that he would so soon become a stumbling block to the king's power.

"Your Majesty is right. When people get old, they are no longer useful and cannot see things comprehensively. If that is the case, then Your Majesty should choose someone more capable and virtuous!"

After saying this, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland just walked away in anger.

"Prime Minister!"

"Prime Minister!"

...

The ministers almost instinctively tried to persuade Caesar IV to stay. This scene further strengthened Caesar IV's decision. He had been a little hesitant at first, but now he had no more reservations.

Now it is the Grand Duke of Newfoundland who left on his own initiative, which has led to such a situation. If the Grand Duke of Newfoundland pretends to be ignorant and insists on holding on to his position, he will be even more passive.

"The Grand Duke of Newfoundland has made great contributions to the kingdom. He is now old and has stepped down, but the position of Prime Minister cannot remain vacant.

Duke Efiero..."

Before he could finish his words, the Grand Duke of Efiero, who was named, interrupted him and said, "Your Majesty, I am two years older than the Grand Duke of Newfoundland!"

The earth-shattering answer shocked the court.

The former prime minister was sent back home by the king, and the new prime minister's appointment had not even been announced, but he jumped out to mess things up.

It's definitely a drama of royal infighting.

If Caesar IV had known that the situation would turn out like this, he would probably not have started by taking action against the prime minister right from the start.

Unfortunately, there is no regret medicine in politics. Once Grand Duke Efiero's words came to fruition, he was doomed to not be able to continue staying in the court, otherwise he would be slapping Caesar IV in the face.

The resignation of the two elders of the royal camp immediately broke the political balance of the court. Even though Caesar IV had made preparations in advance, he did not expect the situation to deteriorate to this point.

Without much lingering, the heartbroken Grand Duke Efiero simply waved his sleeves and strode out of the court.

There were already few people in the hall, and the two most important seats were suddenly vacant, and the atmosphere suddenly became subtle.

Everyone was waiting for Caesar IV to announce new personnel appointments, but after the lesson just now, he became hesitant.

The transfer of power also requires a transition. With the loss of two elders at once, the royal camp directly lost its leader in the court.

This is the most hardcore royalist!

The first blow he took after taking power was against his own people. Hudson didn't know how to complain.

But if you think about it carefully, there is nothing wrong with what Caesar IV did. Before this, he had discussed personnel adjustments with the prime minister, but the prime minister rejected them all.

The reasons given were extremely embarrassing: either they said that the successor had limited ability and was not as capable as the current incumbent in the court; or they angrily criticized the successor pushed forward by Caesar IV as a flatterer.

After many fruitless discussions, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland became the biggest stumbling block on Caesar IV's path to power. Without taking down the chancellor, it would be difficult to place his own people in the court.

After making concessions again and again, Caesar IV, who had accumulated a lot of resentment, finally exploded.

As a king, it was natural for him to hold power. But in his case, he almost became a high-level rubber stamp.

Although the ministers in the court respected him as a king and no one did anything to betray the emperor, when it came to state affairs, few of these "loyal ministers" gave him face.

He endured this for more than five years, but no one could understand his grievances.

He could not hold it back any longer and exploded, only to suddenly realize that he had thought too simply. Without the cooperation of the royal camp in the court, his plan was full of loopholes.

Whether Caesar IV was willing or not, the vacant positions of prime minister and minister of war had to be filled by people in the court.

It would be impossible for someone to randomly appoint a confidant to such an important position in the Alpha Kingdom.
